Class DepartmentControllerTests

java.lang.Object
kp.company.controller.DepartmentControllerTests
@ExtendWith(org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension.class) @WebMvcTest(DepartmentsController.class) class DepartmentControllerTests extends Object
The DepartmentsController tests using the MockMvc.
